title: 20+ of the best noise-cancelling headphones and earbuds deals ahead of Black Friday
content: The best two headphones deals ahead of Black Friday are the Bose QuietComfort Ultra earbuds on sale for $229 and the Sony WH-1000XM5 headphones for $101.99 off.

title: Score 25% off Lego 2K Drive for Nintendo Switch at Amazon
content: As of Nov. 20, you can get 'Lego 2K Drive' for Nintendo Switch for just $14.99. That's a 25% discount, or $5 off.
